name: Shining Light
description: I'm glad this found you friend. I made these spiritual tools for anyone to use. The runes on this item are used for protection of the spirit. The first use cleanses spiritual energy and the second creates a barrier to protect from further spiritual assault. Engraved into the bits of the given item is a prayer for protection and cleansing. If you feel like you are in need of some extra energetic protection, I am offering this trade to you. Make the transaction with the intention of using that energy to destroy any negative spiritual energy afflicting you. Say to yourself "As I accept this gift, any negative energy attached to me will pass into the vessel." Then, burn the token with the intention of release. Say again to yourself, "as I release this gift, so does the negative energy release from me." May your spirit be at peace, and may your intention to be free endure.
